content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order to build AP workflow in a comfortable way, critical working files, supporting Guidelines, shared files and other useful AP tips and tricks were summarized in Microsoft Teams Channel (MS Teams AP Wiki).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You have already saw it in Confluence paragraph dedicated for requesting agreed set of accesses into systems and workspaces.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here we propose you to pay special attention to AP Teams Channel Wiki:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":151259,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e4c2f5fb-6313-466f-8baa-de86ce7832ba/Picture6.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e4c2f5fb-6313-466f-8baa-de86ce7832ba/Picture6.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture6.png\",\"name\":\"Picture6.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e4c2f5fb-6313-466f-8baa-de86ce7832ba\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":900,\"height\":504},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All links on files and folders summarized here are either used for daily working routine or describe critical AP processes. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"So that‚Äôs essential to maintain this page up-to date. That would help everyone in Team to find useful info in ‚Äúone click‚Äù.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Now you are the part of this maintenance best practice! üòä\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Teams Wiki if fully editable by any Team Member.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The links summarized above are worth studying, please review files one by one and ask your Supervisor for clarifications if needed.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Congratulations! You are done with introduction to AP! Please move on to the test! \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"*Please be informed that AP test occurs 14 days after the date when you‚Äôve joined CA department (this time is provided for some top-level studying).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
